prefuse.util
Class StringLib

java.lang.Object
  prefuse.util.StringLib

public class StringLib
extends java.lang.Object

Library of utility routines pertaining to Strings.

Author:
jeffrey heer

                                          java.awt.FontMetrics fm,
                                          int width)
Abbreviate a String by simply truncating it.

Parameters:
